com.mailroom.common

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mailroom.common.DatabaseManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MysqlManager, PostgreSQLManager, SQLiteManager

    public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Class of Database Managers All Classes Extending this one should Override ALL methods This class should never be directly instantiated
    Author:
    James sitzja@grizzlies.adams.edu

      • login

        public User login(java.lang.String userName,
                  int password)
        Allows User to Login into System Only called from MainClient
        Parameters:
        userName - username of user
        password - integer hash of username and password added together
        Returns:
        returns a valid user on success or user with user_id=-1 on failure

        Returns:
        Status of SQL Execution
